trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemDataBound" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemDataBound" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>。

trans-unit.source: A new line of text indicating the item type is displayed whenever a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> item is created.
trans-unit.target: 新的一行文字表示的項目類型會顯示每當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>建立項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs.Item" /> property is set to this value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem" /> associated with the event.
Use this property to access the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來存取的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>與此事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> of the item associated with this event from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>從這個事件相關聯的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性。
